title: Number of committed crimes , by type U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of committed crimes for 9 number of Type of crimes.
Type of crime Property crime  (total) has the highest Number of committed crimes and Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter has the lowest Number of committed crimes.
The highest Type of crime Property crime  (total) has 7179831.0 more Number of committed crimes than the lowest Type of crime Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Type of crime in the x axis and Number of committed crimes in the y axis.
Type of crime Property crime  (total) has the highest Number of committed crimes and Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter has the lowest Number of committed crimes.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of committed crimes for 9 number of Type of crimes.
Type of crime Property crime  (total) has the highest Number of committed crimes and Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter has the lowest Number of committed crimes.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of committed crimes for 9 number of Type of crimes.
The Number of committed crimes is appeared to be the highest at Type of crime Property crime  (total) and lowest at Type of crime Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter.
Second maximum Number of committed crimes is found at Type of crime Larceny-theft.
The highest Type of crime Property crime  (total) has 7179831.0 more Number of committed crimes than the lowest Type of crime Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter.
Number of committed crimes at Type of crime Property crime  (total) is 7196045.0 , second place is Larceny-theft at 5217055.0, and thirdly is Burglary at 1230149.0.
The lowest value 16214.0 at Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter is almost 3.84 times smaller than the average value 1871554.56.
The Number of committed crimes is 16843991.0 if we add up values of all Type of crimes.
